channel.title: [pi] rules interface
channel.description: Alright so I've googled this with no luck on tutorials, but I've heard it's client sided. How do I have a rules interface when people first log on that you can accept or deny and if you deny you get logged out?

item.title: [pi] rules interface

item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

Alright so I’ve googled this with no luck on tutorials, but I’ve heard it’s client sided. How do I have a rules interface when people first log on that you can accept or deny and if you deny you get logged out?
